name: The Chalet
storyline:
It's dark, the moon shadows of the trees dance behind the window and the planks of the chalet creak under your feet as you investigate... Where have the professor and his team gone? Why all the scary notes in the living room? And why so many mysteries! 
 
  Dare to confront the chalet and its ghosts in this game of adventure and reflection, trying to solve the riddles that prevent the progress of your investigation until you discover what is hidden in the depths of the chalet! 
 
- A mysterious and intriguing atmosphere, led by quality graphics and soundtrack. 
 
- A scenario and characters elaborated. 
 
- An advanced backup system, you never lose your progress! 
 
- A solution included in the game and visible in one click to never get stuck. 
 
- 7 chapters, explore the cottage from the basement to the attic! 
 
- 10 mini games to solve. 
 
- Game available in English and French 
 
  Discover now " The Chalet " on your phone or android tablet and PC, in full version for free!
